instruction: Suggest a resolution to the following ethical dilemma: Your friend has been caught cheating on a test.
output: A resolution to this ethical dilemma would be for your friend to take responsibility for their actions and accept the consequences of their cheating. They should also apologize to their teacher, classmates, and others who might be impacted by the cheating, if appropriate. If it is applicable, the friend should also come up with a plan to make up for their wrongdoings, such as additional assignments, retaking the test, or taking a course on ethics and integrity.
